C

cMidHeight - Variable in class Screen_Utilities.Location
This is half of the screen height.
cMidWidth - Variable in class Screen_Utilities.Location
This is half of the screen width.

L

localC - Variable in class Screen_Utilities.Location
This is the container of the application.
Location - class Screen_Utilities.Location.
This class provides a simpler way to position the application on the monitor screen.
Location(Container) - Constructor for class Screen_Utilities.Location
This constructs an object of the class.

P

p - Variable in class Screen_Utilities.Location
This is a variable of the MyPrint class.

S

screen - Variable in class Screen_Utilities.Location
This is the variable that describes the screen object.
Screen_Utilities - package Screen_Utilities
 
screenHeight - Variable in class Screen_Utilities.Location
This is the height of the screen.
screenWidth - Variable in class Screen_Utilities.Location
This is the width of the screen.
setLocation(String) - Method in class Screen_Utilities.Location
Sets the location of the application container on the monitor screen.

T

tk - Variable in class Screen_Utilities.Location
This is a variable of the Toolkit class that gives the program access to the screen dimensions.

X

x_loc - Variable in class Screen_Utilities.Location
This is a point on the north-south axis of the screen.

Y

y_loc - Variable in class Screen_Utilities.Location
This is a point on the west-east axis of the screen.
